name: Superman
occupation: Reporter for the Daily Planet and novelist
powers: Super strength, flight, invulnerability, super speed, heat vision, freeze breath, x-ray vision, superhuman hearing, healing factor

name: Spider-Man
occupation: Peter is an accomplished scientist, inventor and photographer.
powers: Peter can cling to most surfaces, has superhuman strength and is roughly 15 times more agile than a regular human. His spider-sense provides an early warning detection system linked with his superhuman kinesthetics, enabling him the ability to evade most any injury.

name: Batman
powers: Exceptional martial artist, combat strategy, inexhaustible wealth, brilliant deductive skill, advanced technology.

name: Ironman
occupation: Inventor, Industrialist; former United States Secretary of Defense
powers: None; Tony has a genius level intellect that allows him to invent a wide range of sophisticated devices, specializing in advanced weapons and armor. He possesses a keen business mind.

name: Captain America
powers: The Super-Soldier formula that he had metabolized had enhanced all of his bodily functions to the peak of human efficiency. Most notably, his body eliminates the excessive build-up of fatigue-producing poisons in his muscles, granting him phenomenal endurance.

name: Wonder Woman
occupation: Adventurer, Emissary to the world of Man, Protector of Paradise Island; former Goddess of Truth
powers: Super strength, invulnerability, flight, combat skill, combat strategy, superhuman agility, healing factor, magic weaponry

name: Wolverine
occupation: Adventurer, instructor, former bartender, bouncer, spy, government operative, mercenary, soldier, sailor, miner.
powers: Wolverine is a mutant who possesses the ability to regenerate damaged or destroyed areas of his cellular structure at a rate far greater than that of an ordinary human. Wolverine's agility and reflexes are similarly enhanced.In addition, Wolverine’s healing factor provides him with an extended lifespan by slowing the effects of the aging process. Wolverine’s skeleton includes six retractable one-foot long bone claws, three in each arm.

name: Flash
powers: An object-oriented computer programming language commonly used to create interactive effects within web browsers.

name: Thor
powers: Thor's flesh and bones are several times denser than a human's.As Lord of Asgard, Thor possessed the Odinforce, which enabled him to tap into the near-infinite resources of cosmic and mystical energies, enhancing all of his abilities.

name: Hulk
powers: The Hulk possesses an incredible level of superhuman physical ability. His capacity for physical strength is potentially limitless due to the fact that the Hulk's strength increases proportionally with his level of great emotional stress, anger in particular. The Hulk uses his superhumanly strong leg muscles to leap great distances.

name: Daredevil
occupation: Adventurer, vigilante, Attorney at Law, Leader of the Hand
powers: In compensation for his lost sight, Daredevil’s other four senses have been preternaturally enhanced. Daredevil possesses the strength, speed, agility, and endurance, not to mention acrobatic and gymnastic skills, of an Olympic-level athlete.
